LanguageData.ARA_DormancyVat.label: Arachne dormant cocoon
LanguageData.ARA_DormancyVat.description: The Arachne Swarm is a special living facility used to store excess Zerg. The Zerg stored in it will fall into an immortal state of dormancy, waiting for the main nest to be summoned again.
LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.label: Essence extraction chamber
LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.description: A special living structure that can house captives of the Arachne swarm, extract their genetic material in a slow and painful way, and convert it into essence for use by the swarm. \n\n——Don’t ask how it was collected.
